summary: Completed comprehensive testing of attendance management system. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend functionality tested successfully including worker management, attendance marking, dashboard statistics, and monthly reports.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components
design_issues.note: Accessibility warning - should add proper descriptions to dialog components

passed_tests: Worker CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Attendance marking with automatic wage calculation
Worker management UI (add, edit, search, delete)
Attendance marking form with time inputs
